message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. We believe its value extends far beyond its monetary worth, making it a true asset for those who appreciate the finer things. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I propose a starting price of $500000. I look forward to discussing this opportunity with you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the features you've highlighted, $500000 is significantly lower than what I'm able to pay.  Given my budget and the value I'm looking for, I'm willing to offer $1000000. This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing me to acquire the product and you to secure a substantial sale.
